title: Why we should think twice before rejecting Facebook’s Libra currency
text:
The world has seen many faces of Mark Zuckerberg in his 15 years in charge of Facebook. Frat boy genius, Very Serious Businessman, contrite corporate citizen, even defender of privacy.

Today, when the 35-year-old chief executive goes on front of the US Congress to answer questions about his new digital currency, Libra, we will see a new persona: Mark Zuckerberg, American hero, champion of the Yankee dollar.

That is the strategy revealed in his written testimony to Congress, which will form the basis of a grilling from the House of Representatives starting at 3pm BST. His argument is that, far from considering Libra a threat to its financial supremacy, the USA must embrace it or be outcompeted...
